metadata.description: Research-driven project scaffolding with design systems, database/ORM setup, Railway deployment, and PWA support. Supports SwiftUI, Jetpack Compose, Kotlin XML, Flutter, Expo React Native, Node/Express, FastAPI, Flask, Django, Rust, Next.js, Nuxt.js, Turborepo monorepos, and Progressive Web Apps.

plugins.name: eagle-multi-stack-scaffolder
plugins.description: Research-driven scaffolding with design systems, database/ORM setup (PostgreSQL, Prisma, Drizzle, SQLAlchemy), object storage (MinIO), Railway deployment, and PWA scaffolding. Supports SwiftUI, Jetpack Compose, Kotlin XML, Flutter, Expo React Native, Node/Express, FastAPI, Flask, Django, Rust, Next.js, Nuxt.js, Turborepo monorepos, and Progressive Web Apps (Quasar, Ionic, Konsta UI).
